events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin review shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles, specifically for a software developer position.
A recruiter specializing in engineering has been assigned to your case to assist with the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully to evaluate your software engineering skills and experience.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed responses during the screening. Looking forward to the next steps.
Your technical interview with the Engineering team has been scheduled for April 10th at 10:00 AM UTC.
You have completed the technical interview with strong performance, demonstrating solid software development skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled on April 15th to discuss your career goals and company culture fit.
The HR interview went well, and you communicated effectively about your motivations and expectations.
We are pleased to propose an offer for you to join our engineering team as a Software Developer.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. You expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer to become a Software Developer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started with access to all necessary tools and introduction to the Engineering team.
The hiring case is now closed successfully with you fully integrated into the engineering department.
